trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Vidor
There were no other sightings in Vidor on or around January 9th 2010
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 8:10 on a clear, dark night i was traveling westbound on interstate 10 near vidor texas. i looked through my windshield to observe any clouds or stars and saw 3 lights in a row aligned with the interstate. the distance between each light appeared to be the same. hard to guess, but approximately 300-400 yards apart. i stuck my head closer to the windshield and noticed a 4th light closer to my vehicle that was not visible when i was sitting back, also about 300-400 yards from the next closest. the lights were approximately 400-500 yards above the ground. the lights were bright white. each object\light actually consisted of 2 lights. difficult to explain, but imagine a football laying on it's side and well rounded, not pointed. there was a larger oval shaped white lite on the bottom, then a gap, then a smaller oval white light above it. no other colors were noticed. no blinking lights were noticed, and no sound was noticed. i will number the objects from closest to furthest with 1 being closest and 4 being furthest for this report. soon after initially observing the objects, object 2 moved closer to object 3 and appeared to go behind 3 then suddenly disappeared. shortly after that, 3 disappeared. 4 remained stable. i leaned forward to find 1 again and noticed that it was even with my drivers window. it remained there for a short while, but due to the fact that i was driving, i lost visual contact with it after a couple of minutes. during the time while i was driving and looking for 1, i lost contact with 4. after thinking that they were gone, i spotted a new light 5(same characteristics as 1-4) on my right. same height, but a greater distance from me, possibly 1000 yards. this object was moving west faster than i could keep up (the others 2-4 appeared to be at the same speed as me, and 1 appeared slower than me, i was traveling at 70mph). when i turned on highway 69 north in beaumont at 8:20, that moved the object behind me and i lost visual contact. i do not believe thess objects to be planes, helicopters, weather balloons, tower lights, flares or glare. i would be much obliged for an explanation of what i saw.
